description.translate: Happy at breakfast, but not the rest of the time. Although the opposite, or even both.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§2Bas Chacelïn\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Content au petit déjeuné, mais pas le reste du temps.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Quoique l'inverse, ou même les deux.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Happy at breakfast, but not the rest of the time.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Although the opposite, or even both.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7RES§a1 §7STR§c-2\"}"]}}
